title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 64 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 64 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长）神阿，我哀叹的时候，求你听我的声音。求你保护我的性命，不受仇敌的惊恐。

lineList.en: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:
lineList.cn: 求你把我隐藏，使我脱离恶之人的暗谋，和作孽之人的扰乱。

lineList.en: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
lineList.cn: 他们磨舌如刀，发出苦毒的言语，好像比准了的箭。

lineList.en: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
lineList.cn: 要在暗地射完全人。他们忽然射他，并不惧怕。

lineList.en: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?
lineList.cn: 他们彼此勉励设下恶计。他们商量暗设网罗，说，谁能看见。

lineList.en: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.
lineList.cn: 他们图谋奸恶，说，我们是极力图谋的。他们各人的意念心思是深的。

lineList.en: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded.
lineList.cn: 但神要射他们。他们忽然被箭射伤。

lineList.en: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.
lineList.cn: 他们必然绊跌，被自己的舌头所害。凡看见他们的，必都摇头。

lineList.en: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.
lineList.cn: 众人都要害怕，要传杨神的工作，并且明白他的作为。

lineList.en: The righteous shall be glad in the LORD, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
lineList.cn: 义人必因耶和华欢喜，并要投靠他。凡心里正直的人，都要夸口。
